translation.description: With our day-to-day life increasingly digitalised, it is vital for policymakers to track our digital economy and ensure that Malaysia remains modern and internationally competitive. This dashboard summarises key trends in businesses' and households' access to ICT tools, as well as the performance of e-commerce and the ICT sector. It will be deepened in line with the evolution of our ICT-related surveys on an annual basis.

businesses.usage: Are businesses increasing their use of ICT tools?
businesses.usage_by_state: How does the use of ICT tools differ across states?
businesses.usage_by_state_desc: This distribution is based on the location of the business, rather than the location of their Internet Service Provider (ISP). For example, transactions for a business in Perlis who uses a KL-based ISP will be counted under Perlis.

household.access: Are households getting greater access to ICT tools?
household.access_by_state: How does household access to ICT tools differ across states?
household.access_by_state_desc: This distribution is based on householdsâ€™ location of residence, rather than the location of their Internet Service Provider (ISP). For example, a household in Perlis who uses a KL-based ISP will be counted under Perlis.

ecommerce.by_state: How does E-Commerce differ across states?
ecommerce.by_state_desc: This distribution is based on the location of the business, rather than the location of their Internet Service Provider (ISP). For example, online transactions for a business in Perlis who uses a KL-based ISP will be counted under Perlis.
